SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.MENUNO,A.MENUNAME ,(SELECT LICENSENAME FROM ma900020 WHERE LICENSENO = A.LICENSENO) AS LICENSENO_ ,A.MENUDESC,A.MENUVAL ,DATE_FORMAT(A.REGDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS REGDATE ,A.ISDELETE ,(SELECT USERNAME FROM me800010 WHERE USERNO = A.REGUSER) AS REGUSER_ ,@RNUM:=@RNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM FROM ma900030 A ,(SELECT @RNUM := 0) R WHERE A.ISDELETE = 0
AND A.MENUNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{menuName},'%')
AND A.MENUVAL LIKE CONCAT('%',#{menuVal},'%')
ORDER BY A.MENUNO DESC ) X WHERE ROWNUM Between #{startRowNum} and #{endRowNum}

SELECT count(*) FROM ma900030 WHERE ISDELETE = 0
AND MENUNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{menuName},'%')
AND MENUVAL LIKE CONCAT('%',#{menuVal},'%')

SELECT A.MENUNO ,A.MENUNAME ,A.LICENSENO ,A.MENUDESC ,A.MENUVAL ,A.REGDATE ,A.ISDELETE ,CASE WHEN ISDELETE = 0 THEN '사용' WHEN ISDELETE = 1 THEN '미사용' END AS ISDELETE_ ,(SELECT LICENSENAME FROM ma900020 WHERE A.LICENSENO = LICENSENO) AS LICENSENO_ FROM ma900030 A WHERE A.MENUNO = #{menuno}
